article:
Jason has a new friend. His name is Daniel. Daniel is as old as him. He is friendly and clever and he always has new ideas. But there is one _ . Daniel only has one _ . He lost other one in a car accident. Jason _ enjoys being with Daniel. They sometimes go to the  _ to see movies together. Sometimes they go to the zoo to see _ . They spend much time talking with each other. Jason likes listening to his new friends.
Then one day Jason invited Daniel to eat out with some other friends. Jason was  _ the other boys would like Daniel, too. "Meet us at the _ ," said Jason.
Daniel walked into the restaurant. All the other boys looked at him. Daniel got very nervous. "I hope they wont'  _ at my arm," he thought. He really wanted to become friends with Jason's friends.
"Wow," said one of the boys. "That's a really nice shirt!"
Daniel was  _ . After that, Jason's friends invite Daniel out every weekend.
